node.title: Episode 24: J.H. Kellogg & Ellen White
node.description: John Harvey Kellogg today famous for the breakfast cereals named after him was once one of the foremost physicians in the United States. At one point his hospital was one of the biggest in the USA but his relationship with the church and its teachings would get complicated and eventually there would be a parting of the ways. A great life and talent that would sadly veer off track.
